thread.title: Ashlee Simpson's 6-Year-Old Son Bronx Loves Music, Already Writes Songs
thread.title_full: Ashlee Simpson's 6-Year-Old Son Bronx Loves Music, Already Writes Songs

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Ashlee Simpson's 6-Year-Old Son Bronx Loves Music, Already Writes Songs
text:
Comments Ashlee revealed her 6-year-old son Bronx is into music, loves to dance around, and already writes little songs. 
Proud momma Ashlee Simpson just couldn't stop gushing about her son, 6-year-old Bronx Mowgli, whom she has with then husband Pete Wentz . The 31-year-old actress-singer revealed the little boy does love music and already writes songs. "He's so into music," Ashlee told PEOPLE. "He loves to dance around and he writes little songs. They're good! It's so cute." And in an attempt to support Bronx's musical talents, Ashlee and her husband Evan Ross , 27, are planning to get him something special for his 7th birthday next month. "We're going to have to get Bronx a Guitar Hero Live," Evan revealed."He's super into video games and this one is perfect for him," added Ashlee. Ashlee and Evan, who tied the knot back on August 30 last year, have a daughter together named Jagger Snow Ross. She was born on July 30 this year. Regarding big brother Bronx, Ashlee previously told PEOPLE, "He dances for her and entertains her," adding, "Bronx is such a good big brother. He's a pro."
